name: 普拉部·地伐 Prabhu Deva
intro: Prabhu Deva is an Indian film director, dance choreographer and actor, known for his works predominantly in Tamil, Telugu, Bollywood, Malayalam and Kannada films. In a career spanning twenty-five years, he has performed and designed a wide range of dancing styles. He has garnered two National Film Awards for Best Choreography; widely referred in the media as Indian Michael Jackson.
